welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bernal, Argentina! This charming city is known for its picturesque streets, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bernal has to offer.

restaurants.name: Da Leo, La Vera Pizza Napolitana
restaurants.description: Da Leo, La Vera Pizza Napolitana is a pizzeria located in Bernal.
restaurants.address: Av. Caceros 1346 (e/ Ramella y Constitución), B1876 Bernal, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: Cappotte
restaurants.description: Cappotte is a italian restaurant located in Wilde.
restaurants.address: Av. Ramón Franco 5751 (e/ Lomas de Zamora y Polonia), B1875 Wilde, Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: Las mil delicias
restaurants.description: Las mil delicias is a bakery located in Villa Domínico.
restaurants.address: Av. Belgrano (El Salvador), 1874 Villa Domínico, Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: El Tano Debenedetti
restaurants.description: El Tano Debenedetti is a bbq joint located in Avellaneda.
restaurants.address: Av. Agustín Debenedetti 2999 (esq. Hernan Cortes), B1872HVB Avellaneda, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: Betos
restaurants.description: Betos is a sandwich spot located in Sarandí.
restaurants.address: Parque Avellaneda Shopping (Local 1008), 1870 Sarandí, Buenos Aires
